TopicTitle: Moving from 0.24.1 to 0.24.2 pretty much broke all mods

Articles.Content:
And here i thought it was a simple hotfix to remedy the right click issue?

I literally went from playing yesterday with mods (launching the game several times) with no issues what so ever in 0.24.1

To now, can't even launch with the most basic mods in 0.24.2

(Most obvious example is the KSPRC - Renaissance Compilation)

Installed in the exact same ways.

Fresh install (fresh folder) with 0.24.1 then the mods in proper orders. Worked perfect.

Same fresh install method but with 0.24.2, crashes on startup.

64bit for both.

Anyone else noticed the latest hotfix utterly breaking most mods?

Should say....

Again.

And odds are there maybe another patch soonish. Never know.

It broke a lot in terms of mod compatibility of the 64 bit client for me. Still trying to figure out what mod combination it is exactly thats not working anymore. But yeah, crashes on start up, crashing when going to the launchpad / runway etc. It seems like I am back to 32 bit for a while...
